mapper.select: SELECT BD_NUM,bo_num,bk_name,bk_lcode,bd_date,bd_return_date,bd_return_extension,bk_image,bd_on_off,bd_state_num FROM BORROWLIST JOIN BORROWDETAIL ON BO_NUM=BD_BO_NUM JOIN BOOKS ON books.bk_code=borrowdetail.bd_bcode and bd_lcode=bk_lcode WHERE BO_ID=#{id} AND (bd_state_num=1 OR bd_state_num=2 OR bd_state_num=4 OR bd_state_num=5)
SELECT SUM(BD_RETURN_DATE-BD_REAL_RETURN_DATE) FROM BORROWLIST JOIN BORROWDETAIL ON BD_BO_NUM=BO_NUM WHERE BO_ID=#{id} AND (BD_RETURN_DATE-BD_REAL_RETURN_DATE)<0
SELECT COUNT(BD_RETURN_DATE-BD_REAL_RETURN_DATE) FROM BORROWLIST JOIN BORROWDETAIL ON BD_BO_NUM=BO_NUM WHERE BO_ID=#{id} AND (BD_RETURN_DATE-BD_REAL_RETURN_DATE)<0
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MB_AREA=#{mb_area} WHERE MB_ID=#{mb_id}
mapper.select: SELECT bo_num,bk_name,bd_date,bd_return_date,bd_real_return_date,bd_return_date-bd_real_return_date as ARREARSDAY FROM BORROWLIST JOIN BORROWDETAIL ON BO_NUM=BD_BO_NUM JOIN BOOKS ON BD_BCODE=BK_CODE AND BD_LCODE=BK_LCODE WHERE BO_ID=#{id} AND (BD_RETURN_DATE-BD_REAL_RETURN_DATE)<0
SELECT RANK FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RANK,RESERVATION.* FROM RESERVATION WHERE RT_CODE=#{rv_code} ORDER BY RT_NUM) WHERE RT_ID=#{rv_id} AND RT_LCODE=#{rv_lcode}

SELECT BG_CATE,COUNT(BK_BG_NUM) CNT FROM BORROWLIST JOIN BORROWDETAIL ON BO_NUM=BD_BO_NUM JOIN BOOKS ON BK_CODE=BD_BCODE AND BK_LCODE=BD_LCODE JOIN BIGGROUP ON BG_NUM=BK_BG_NUM WHERE borrowlist.bo_id=#{id} GROUP BY BG_CATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE RT_CODE = #{rv_code} AND RT_LCODE = #{rv_lcode}
